extendedInfo.description: The Cracked Android app is finally here!  If you like Cracked.com, own a mobile device and just generally want to appear more attractive, this is the app youâve been waiting for.Chances are youâve been navigating Cracked.com by tapping, pinching and groping your touch screen. Could that be why the man/woman of your dreams has yet to tackle you in public and make love to you? Almost definitely.The Cracked Reader Lite combines all of the mind blowing facts (did you know a zombie apocalypse is scientifically possible?), pop culture analysis (whoâs the greatest Batman of all time?), and info-graphics (a body map explaining what your neck tattoo says about you to prospective employers) that have made Cracked.com the fastest growing humor site on the internet.Includes:* An easy to navigate, fast loading feed featuring all of our latest content.* Faster loading and easier to navigate versions of all of the content that used to be so difficult to read in the bathroom.Fans are already calling it a major breakthrough in laughing at your mobile phone technology:âThe thing they said about me is totally true. Buy this app or Iâll think youâre a pervert, and we'll never get it on.â âMan / Woman of your dreams.******The latest version is a big update!  Not only are we bringing you a sexier design, weâve loaded the Cracked Android app with more mind-blowing facts than ever before.  Some of the newest features include:-View articles by your favorite columnist or by category-Pinch/zoom your way through Photoplasty Contests-Read the comments and sort them too!-More details than ever before about your favorite videos like Cast & Crew infoThere's more work to be done so be sure to email us your feedback!

reviews.title: Great new interface
reviews.comment: Loving the new interface. Makes reading well-written dick jokes *so* much easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good bacon
reviews.comment: Works great now, all good after you removed the insane permissions request.
reviews.author: Christer Olofsson

reviews.title: The new layout sucks
reviews.comment: Now to see the latest articles i have to click through several different menus.  The old version that showed a simple list was far superior.
reviews.author: Richard Hawes

reviews.title: New update is great!
reviews.comment: I love the new update! I like that I can now browse articles by subject, such as science and history, instead of opening up a Chrome tab and browsing the website for past articles. This comes in handy for adding some classic articles to my favorites, something I couldn\'t do before the update.
reviews.author: Jeri Hutton

reviews.title: GPS constantly on
reviews.comment: Wanna stop draining my battery by using my GPS location for as long as i have the app open to show me ads I don\'t want to see in the first place?
reviews.author: Cagdas Kurban

reviews.title: New update flaws
reviews.comment: On photoplasty the number info blocks the bottom of the image, photoplasty is my favorite section. Plus gifs still don\'t work on android
reviews.author: roland beaulieu

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: Update looks and feels much nicer. Pics load faster. I have high hopes for videos working. Good job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would be awesome
reviews.comment: If the links at the bottom of the articles didn\'t exit the app and take you to the site in the browser. I want to read articles within the app, otherwise I would have just gone to the site to begin with.
reviews.author: Alan Ojeda

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: I still prefer the older layout but I do appreciate fixing the permissions.
reviews.author: David Kinley

reviews.title: Very well done!
reviews.comment: This is my favorite app, and the update is great, the only problem is no landscape mode. -1 star for that.
reviews.author: John Cochran

reviews.title: Wont work
reviews.comment: For some reason since the update it wont load it just freezes on the first page I loved the app before the update and now I can\'t use it
reviews.author: Owenslaughter

reviews.title: Landscape mode, please!
reviews.comment: Why remove the landscape mode with the otherwise cool update? Poor rating, until landscape\'s back.
reviews.author: Ricardo Miguel Silva

reviews.title: One more thing
reviews.comment: Second review, I forgot to complain about why this app turns in my gps. Why.
reviews.author: Sean Moore

reviews.title: No landscape mode.
reviews.comment: Good update, but the lack of landscape mode when reading articles is a real let-down.
reviews.author: Sam Harrington

reviews.title: Problem solved!
reviews.comment: Now\'s more like it! Running smoothly, and I love the new features (comments are half the fun!). Great work!
reviews.author: Rafael Carmona

reviews.title: Permission issue fixed now to hope features are too
reviews.comment: Update. Glad they listened. Permissions now mostly make sense. No worrying about them sending mass emails to my friends now that they dropped that permission need. Have upgraded and will check on if I have access to all the cracked articles this time. Thanks for listening guys.
reviews.author: Kris Athow

reviews.title: Articles
reviews.comment: New articles aren\'t showing up. Only one article is showing up each day. I\'m uninstalling because at this point it\'s easier to just use the website.
reviews.author: Kyra Llewellyn

reviews.title: Permissions are now fixed at least
reviews.comment: Glad you removed the crazy microphone, calendar, bluetongue and secret emailing permissions. But I remain distrustful of what was lazy or irresponsible coding - coming from a fellow developer. What were you thinking? Forget to change a manifest somewhere? Do better in future. As for the app itself, average.
reviews.author: Matt Leebody
